    Reference

    All functions

    calculate_h1_rcd()

    Calculate h1 from aggregated incidence data

    calculate_r0_rc_fromdata()

    Calculate R0 and Rc on an incidence dataset

    calculate_r0_rc_fromdata_delay()

    Calculate R0 and Rc on an incidence dataset

    calculate_r0_rc_fromdata_delay_rcd()

    Calculate R0 and Rc on an incidence dataset with delays and RCD

    calculate_r0_rc_fromdata_rcd()

    Calculate R0 and Rc on an incidence dataset with RCD

    calculate_tau_rcd()

    Calculate the targeting ratio from incidence data with information on RCD

    calibrate_vivax_equilibrium()

    Calibrate the vivax model

    create_approximation()

    Creates linear interpolation

    format_data_simulation()

    Formating intervention parameters within a database

    get_equilibrium_states_vivax()

    Calculate equilibrium state variables

    get_equilibrium_states_vivax_delay()

    Calculate equilibrium state variables, in model with delay to treatment

    get_equilibrium_states_vivax_rcd()

    Calculate equilibrium state variables

    Calculate equilibrium state variables, RCD model (no referral)

    get_equilibrium_states_vivax_rcd_referral()

    Calculate equilibrium state variables, RCD model (referral)

    get_prop_relapse()

    Calculate proportion of relapses

    get_r0_vivax()

    R0 calculation

    get_rc_vivax()

    Rc calculation, with case management and vector control

    get_rc_vivax_delay()

    Rc calculation, with case management and vector control and delay to treatment

    get_validity_condition_vivax()

    Checks validity condition

    incidence_day2year()

    Converts daily incidence to annual

    incidence_year2day()

    Converts annual incidence to daily

    model_sto_vivax_delay()

    Reaction associated with the vivax model with delays, in stochastic version

    model_sto_vivax_delay_rcd_referral()

    Reaction associated with the vivax model with delays and RCD, in stochastic version

    model_sto_vivax_delay_rcd_referral_mda()

    Reaction associated with the vivax model with delays, RCD and MDA during prophylaxis, in stochastic version

    ode_vivax_cm_importation_vc()

    ODE vivax model with case management, importation and vector control

    ode_vivax_delay()

    ode_vivax_delay_mda()

    ODE vivax model with case management, importation and vector control, including delay to treatment, during MDA prophylaxis

    ode_vivax_delay_rcd_no_referral()

    ode_vivax_delay_rcd_no_referral_mda()

    ODE vivax model with case management, RCD without referral, importation and vector control, including delay to treatment, during MDA prophylaxis

    ode_vivax_delay_rcd_referral()

    ODE vivax model with case management, RCD with referral, importation and vector control, including delay to treatment

    ode_vivax_delay_rcd_referral_mda()

    ODE vivax model with case management, RCD with referral, importation and vector control, including delay to treatment, during PDA prophylaxis

    ode_vivax_mda()

    ODE vivax model with case management, importation and vector control, during MDA prophylaxis

    ode_vivax_rcd()

    ODE vivax model with case management, RCD, importation and vector control, including delay to treatment

    ode_vivax_rcd_mda()

    ODE vivax model with case management, RCD, importation and vector control, during MDA prophylaxis

    Samples uncertainty in incidence and importation data
